name: Dame Nellie Melba
what_did:
Dame Nellie Melba was a world-famous singer.
She performed in grand opera houses and wowed crowds with her voice.
She helped make opera popular in Australia and beyond.
why_matters:
Melba showed that Australians could shine on the world stage.
She became a symbol of talent and elegance.
Even today, she’s remembered as a musical star.

questions.q: What kind of music did she sing?

fun_fact: The dessert 'Peach Melba' was named after her!
